nodes.bodyText:
Perhaps add a bit more:

Could not add btree-index to table 'trackedentityattributevalue', likely because the value column contains values which are longer than the index max size:

And use String.format()
I think we need to enforce a max length (e.g. 1200) on TEI attribute values in the same PR to avoid too long values failing to be persisted.
Lets move "1200" to a constant and re-use across the classes.
Add class javadoc about what this migration is doing and the "special case" of catching failing index creation.
Is this URL available right now? Or is it private? When I tried it said "Page doesnt exist, or is private"
That URL points to a draft that is locked in COP. I will update the URL when the post have been published and gotten a final URL :)
Break on multiple lines with + to avoid weirdness in IDEs.
